Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...No one's here, it seems. I can probably just... put this here...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla moves lightly, placing the fortune bag with the couplets on the table.'}
{3: "Looking around, she can hardly find a flattering spot in the Strike Hawk's lounge."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's not a good habit to judge others' aesthetics, but, still... sigh.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Sorry, Ayla, if this is too embarrassing. I simply prefer my lounge to be as simple as possible.'}
{3: "Ayla is not surprised to hear Chrome's voice behind her."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "You're a captain. Defend yourself, at the very least.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "I was the one who ordered the decorations to be taken down—Wanshi, the sleepyhead, kept hitting them when he woke up. It wasn't a big deal for Constructs, sure...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But as a captain, you're still worried... I see.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're mistaken. Wanshi would use that as an excuse to avoid practice, so I spent some effort replacing all the decorations, and I put all these paddings on the edges and corners of the tables and chairs.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I... see... Oh, right. I almost forgot.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla remembers why she is here and hands Chrome the bag she placed on the table.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I'm actually here on behalf of WGAA to give you this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Is that so? Do I need to give you a receipt, or something? Allow me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Eh, no? You misunderstood. Inside the bags is a pair of couplets from WGAA. They're like decorations for the festival, like... Christmas tree.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome opens the bag and peeks inside, and he finds two pieces of red paper with words on them.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Couplets, you say? It's Lunar New Year, isn't it? My thanks to WGAA for preparing this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh? How come you know what they are, Chrome?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I read about the festival in a book before. I was quite interested in this form of art, so I still remember bits of it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Whoa, I'm so moved! If we can create another person like you, WGAA's effort will not be in vain!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "That's... a bit hyperbolic, isn't it...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As the two of them talk, a tall Construct walks in, looking frustrated.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Capt... Why did you leave me behind... I got caught by old man Nik... I mean, Commander Nikola, and he gave me one hell of a talk...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're right on time. Help me put these couplets up, won't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Seeing the red sheets in Chrome's hand, Kamui walks closer curiously."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What?! What are "couplets"?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chrome gestures to the running Kamui to lower his voice.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Kamui, Wanshi's probably sleeping, so don't wake him up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "What?! You mean there's someone else here? But... I was knocking, and nobody answered!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh, hi, Ayla! We've met, I think—long time no see!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Looks like we can skip the introduction. And you're right—our third member is here, indeed. But it's that time of the day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'That time of the day?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '...For him to sleep.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'A Construct in sleep mode, is it? No wonder no one answered.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wanshi does that a lot, so don't mind it. By the way, can I open this? Does it come with gifts like the red envelopes?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui grabs the fortune bag from Chrome as he speaks and looks inside with anticipation.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Of course! It's for you!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'With a bit of rustling, Kamui opens the bag and looks at the beautifully written couplets in his hands, his head tilted in confusion.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "It's just... pretty red paper, Capt.?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'And there are only two pieces, but... there are three of us!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "This isn't a gift for us personally. They're decors for the room.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's a tradition from the ancient East. Although we're still not sure what their application is, the words written on them are all beautiful blessings.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'In the past, the people in the East would put these couplets up outside the door during Springtime as a way to wish for good luck in the coming year!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ah, I see! If this will make our dreams come true... Capt., Ayla, can I decide where to place it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I don't need it in my room, so... it's fine by me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'How about you, Ayla? Please let me handle this!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I'm supposed to give it to you to handle it, so of course—you have your captain's permission. You can do it.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Capt., Ayla, I will make sure to put the couplets and their intentions to good use!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Kamui grins as he walks toward Wanshi's sleeping pod."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'An item to make our dreams come true... Obviously, it belongs to the one who sleeps the most!', 4: '1'}
